name: OBLIVION (BlurredGames)
description:
This is a very short and dark experience inspired by Amnesia: The Dark Descent by Frictional Games. This project has been created by one person in a few days for Icehouse Jam 2021, so you can find bugs and glitches while playing.

The music was created by Python Blue:

https://python-blue.bandcamp.com/

STORY:

William wakes up in a castle room with no memory of who he is and why he is there. While he explores the room he will discover part of the story that has led him to this mysterious and strange situation.

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Mouse movement: Rotate camera / look around

Interact: Follow the screen messages

Zoom: Right mouse button

ESC: Pause Menu

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

- Download the .zip file

- Extract the file (don't change the folder structure)

- Launch the "OBLIVION.exe" file

- Enjoy!
